themes: perceived neglect of traditional arts organizations
impact of shifting grant criteria on established groups
loss of public funding leading to organizational closure
focus on diversity and new organizations over legacy groups
call for genre diversity in funding support
key_phrases: the City has lost interest in supporting more 'traditional' arts groups
forced out of existence in 2024 due to lack of public funding
criteria changed for City of Austin grants to focus almost entirely on new organizations and 'diversity'
Ensemble VIII lost all funding from the City
I hope this will change so that there is also a diversity of genres supported
barriers_identified: loss of city funding for traditional arts organizations
grant criteria shift away from established groups
overemphasis on new organizations and diversity at expense of legacy groups
solutions_proposed: support a diversity of genres, including longtime arts organizations
restore public financial support to established groups with proven track records
